content: this basket is super easy to make and will surely become your favorite summer accessory hit the beach with style and confidence it s made of two colors of raffia with cotton handles added once the basket is finished pattern uses single_crochet stitch us terms from the beginning to the end finished size height x width x depth 21 x 36 x 8cm/8 x 14 x 3 handles 62cm/24 5 skills chain single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in rounds crocheting in row
